name: 3D Traffic Rider - free moto bike racing games, highway motorcycle racer
name_original: 3D Traffic Rider - free moto bike racing games, highway motorcycle racer
description:
3D Traffic Rider Lite is a amazing motor racing game, you need drive a moto pass fun and challenging terrains, Good luck!

Key Game Features
- Realistic 3D graphics and physics engine
- Awesome music and sound effects
- Free upgrades to new versions
- Full technical support
